abort.already_in_progress: A setup is already in progress for this integration

data_description.dashboard: The base dashboard for View Assist (do not include trailing slash)
data_description.home: The screen to return to after timeout
data_description.music: The view to return to when in music mode
data_description.intent: The view to display for default HA actions for displaying those entities
data_description.assist_prompt: The Assist notification prompt style to use for wake word detection and intent processing

data.mode: The default mode for this satellite device
data.view_timeout: The default time out value for this satellite device in seconds before returning to default view
data.do_not_disturb: Default state for do not disturb mode
data.status_icons: Advanced option! List of custom launch icons to set on start up. Do not change this if you do not know what you are doing
data.status_icons_size: Size of the icons in the status icon display
data.font_style: The default font to use for this satellite device. Font name must match perfectly and be available
data.use_24_hour_time: Sets clock display to 24 hour time when enabled
data.use_announce: Some media player devices, like BrowserMod, cannot use the Home Assistant announce feature while media is playing. This option allows for turning off announce messages if problems arise. Default is on.s
